sentences.en: These include the centuries-old custom of "bul", where leaders would call a temporary stop to fishing for key species in order to give fish stocks an opportunity to replenish.
sentences.cn: 其中包括“布尔”这个保留了几个世纪的古老习俗，地方领导人会呼吁暂时停止捕捞关键品种的鱼，从而给鱼群繁衍的机会。

sentences.en: Their massive wake creates waves at the bottom of the sea, weakening the foundations of the centuries-old buildings themselves.
sentences.cn: 它们巨大的尾流在海底产生波浪，削弱了这些数百年历史建筑本身的地基。

sentences.en: Now the centuries-old preference for sons is eroding—or even reversing.
sentences.cn: 如今，人们上百年来对儿子的偏好，正被削弱，甚至扭转。
